#id=1
#text=Last summer , I decided I wanted to visit some family and friends of mine whom resided on the other side of the country .
#id=2
#text=I carefully considered my travel options and expenses , and decided it would be most economical to take the train .
#id=3
#text=Traveling by train is an easy and straight forward experience , but is also fun and enjoyable .
#id=4
#text=To begin , I visited the railroad 's website and booked my ticket .
#id=5
#text=The ticket was then sent to me via email , which I could print out or display on my mobile device .
#id=6
#text=On the day of travel , I arrived at the train station about a half an hour early and waited for the train to arrive .
#id=7
#text=When the train arrived , the conductor stepped off and asked for tickets .
#id=8
#text=I had elected to use my mobile device to display my ticket , so I showed the ticket to the conductor and he scanned it with his phone .
#id=9
#text=I was then directed towards my assigned seat .
#text=I settled in for the ride , with food and entertainment I had brought with me .
#text=For most of the ride however , I was glued to the window , enjoying the sights of town after town that we traveled through .
#text=The next day I arrived at my destination .
#text=I gathered my bags and stepped off the train , knowing I would return again very soon .
